description: An illustration of the Blue Classic Spaceman Lego minifigure: the minifigure has a yellow face with two black dots for eyes and a small black arc for a smile; the spacesuit is entirely blue with a visorless helmet and an oxygen tank on the back; there is a logo on the chest of the spacesuit showing a yellow planet with a red rocket looping around it leaving a red trail in its wake. The minifigure's left arm is raised upwards and its right arm is down by its side.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
